tool_description: With the rise of Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) as a valuable digital asset, the risk of theft and fraud has also increased. In this detailed article, we will explore the steps and strategies for recovering stolen NFTs, leveraging the expertise of specialists like Wizard Asset Recovery.
name: How To Recover Stolen NFTs
title: How To Recover Stolen NFTs

api_list.name: How to recover stolen NFTs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://how-to-recover-stolen-nfts.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "how-to-recover-stolen-nfts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
